- SIADH is a condition characterized by excessive release of antidiuretic hormone (ADH) from the posterior pituitary gland or other sources.

- Desvenlafaxine is a medication used to treat depression. It is a serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor (SNRI) that affects chemicals in the brain that may become unbalanced and cause depression.
